label.showCountdown: Show timeout countdown bar on notification
label.raw: Accept raw HTML/JavaScript input in msg.payload to format popup.

tooltip.dynamicProperty: Dynamic Property: Send msg.class to append new classes to this widget. NOTE: classes set at runtime will be applied in addition to any class(es) set in the nodes class field.

ui-notification.note: Note: checking Accept raw HTML/JavaScript can allow injection of code. Ensure the input comes from trusted sources.
